title: Sometimes it's beneficial to take note of what other gaming companies do riot :)
body:
As a massive league fan, as well as an avid DOTA and WoW player i have to say i'd like to see riot implement a system where players could earn rewards rather than have to pay for EVERYTHING, take note of DOTAs out of game leveling system where each level you achieve you get a gift box with a "skin" inside, it could be a ward skin, a new sword for tryndamere, a different coloured mushroom for teemo, it could be a loading border that only you can see or a new emote in-game for a specific champ or all champs, it could bee a usable item that dresses every siege minion as a clown. 

While i am aware that riot still needs to make revenue, i have no doubt they would continue to do so even in the presence of an updated system like this, overall it just makes the game MORE FUN! 

please note i am not saying that people should be able to buy skins etc with IP either, i'm happy with the current system, i'd just like to see a fun new off-shoot to it with some gimmicks to make league a bit more of a laugh :)

replies.body: I would leave if Riot did this, no joke.

may i ask why? 

as ive stated a bit further down, i'm simply suggesting riot give the game, even just normals a bit more of a "fun" feel.

No for me. Backwards integration is already present with chroma skins, which allows for people to have the skin without actually buying the skin. The same could be done for exclusive art borders, which would be easy to access through game files anyway. I moved from DoTA to League in part because of the skin system they had.
fair enough points honestly, i'm really only suggesting this as i feel like league needs a bit more novelty to it, at the end of the day it is a game, and the more we can enjoy it the better :)
For me, I wan't to see more customisations for your profile. I mean, the only customisations for your profile are your Summoner Icon and champion/ward skins.
Big part of the incentive for me too, it'd be nice to have a few options :)

Yeah, nah, I don't want this game being a dota clone.

Dota is shit. Sure, you occasionally get free stuff, but it's only crappy stuff most of the time, and it's only to encourage you to use the market.
